Name: Grandcafe Mahler

Name: Grandcafe Mahler
Review Text: If it is not the Friday after work drinks then the service is great, they spot you right away when sitting outside. Friendly staff and have yet to try the food. Mostly the working class from the companies nearby are to be found here, so the crowd is a bit monogamous.
